item.description: Traits # Confer Fire Resistance: The nightmare can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it. Illumination: The nightmare sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. Actions # Hooves: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage. Ethereal Stride: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it magically enter the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.
